attributes.action: Completely get rid of MPs expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The whole expenses thing is a diabolical liberty with tax payers money, the very fact that they say they are doing no wrong is nearly as bad as claiming, course they are doing no wrong, they made the law that way, it needs changing.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
